Administrivia: Pelican and theme update
/post/2018-01-26-administrivia/ 2018-01-26T00:00:00+0000 2018-01-26T00:00:00+0000 I’ve just refreshed the version of Pelican used to generate this blog, along with the associated themes and plugins. It all seems to be working, but if you spot a problem feel free to drop me a line.
